author: Zachary Basu
title: U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson skipped five virus briefings in early days of pandemic
description: A 5,000-word exposé by the Sunday Times of London — "38 days when Britain sleepwalked into disaster" —finds that Prime Minister Boris Johnson, distracted by personal turmoil and his Brexit victory lap, skipped five early crisis briefings (Cobra meetings) on t…
